original_title: Amarakeethi Athukorala Murder: 39 people given bail
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 39 people named as defendants in the murder of the late Parliamentarian Amarakeerthi Athukorala were released on bail on Friday (28).

The late Sri Lankan lawmaker and his private bodyguard were killed in Nittambuwa while heading home from Colombo, during the unrest that broke out in the country on the 9th of May 2022 after the Galle Face protest site was attacked.
China’s next overseas military base likely a Sri Lankan port – Report
